document.name: energyAlloysLogo
document.description: <customer> <Name>Energy Alloys, L.L.C.</Name> <Description>Grabbing a fistful of steel is all in a day's work for employees of Energy Alloys. The company provides oilfield metals and equipment to global oil and gas manufacturers and service companies. Energy Alloys stocks oilfield-specific inventories of carbon, alloy, stainless steel, and nickel bars, as well as tubes and engineered steel products. It also offers made-to-order machining capability for finished and semi-finished components and expert materials consulting when clients need help selecting materials, material grades, or sizes. The company has international sourcing expertise and is a global supplier.</Description> <emailPostFix>@fake.energyalloys.com</emailPostFix> <website>http://www.ealloys.com</website> <address>350 Glenborough, Ste. 300</address> <city>Houston</city> <state>Texas</state> <zip>77067</zip> <country>United States of America</country> <stockTicker /> <industry>Metals/Mining</industry> </customer>
